presenters.name: Alice Johnson
presenters.bio: Lightning Network developer and educator with 5 years of experience building Bitcoin infrastructure. Alice has contributed to multiple Lightning implementations and is passionate about making Bitcoin more accessible.
presenters.title: Lightning Core Developer

presenters.name: Bob Smith
presenters.bio: Bitcoin protocol researcher and educator specializing in Taproot and Schnorr signatures. Bob has published multiple papers on Bitcoin scalability and privacy improvements.
presenters.title: Bitcoin Protocol Researcher

presenters.name: Builder Vancouver Team
presenters.bio: The organizing team behind Builder Vancouver, dedicated to fostering a collaborative Bitcoin builder community in Vancouver. We focus on practical skills, structured knowledge, and open collaboration to accelerate Bitcoin product development.
presenters.title: Builder Vancouver Organizers

presenters.name: Builder Ops Team
presenters.bio: The Builder Ops Team stewards the vibe coding workflow behind the Builder websiteâ€”from structured content design to AI-assisted shipping. They focus on translating experiments with ChatGPT, Cursor, and decentralized tech into educational resources for the Bitcoin community.
presenters.title: Vibe Coding Facilitators
